scripts.test: ME_PORT=8084 NATS_PORT=4224 MONGO_PORT=27111 docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yaml -p unittest up -d ; sleep 5 ;MONGO_SERVER=127.0.0.1:27111 NATS_SERVERS="localhost:4224" ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R spec test/*.spec.js --exit; ME_PORT=8084 NATS_PORT=4224 MONGO_PORT=27111 docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yaml -p unittest down
scripts.test:watch: ME_PORT=8084 NATS_PORT=4224 MONGO_PORT=27111 docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yaml -p unittest up -d ; sleep 5 ;MONGO_SERVER=127.0.0.1:27111 NATS_SERVERS="localhost:4224" ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R spec test/*.spec.js
scripts.build:docker: npm run build; docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=${NPM_TOKEN} -t registry.gitlab.com/fdt2k/wedplan/meal-store ./docker/prod ; docker push registry.gitlab.com/fdt2k/wedplan/meal-store;
scripts.build:docker:dev: npm run build; docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=${NPM_TOKEN} -t registry.gitlab.com/fdt2k/wedplan/meal-store:dev ./docker/prod ; docker push registry.gitlab.com/fdt2k/wedplan/meal-store:dev;
